entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is mentioned as a pet of Mrs. Weasley, and Harry addresses her by name.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is the one who has not received any post, and she is distracted while talking to Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who will go with Harry to his room, and he agrees to let Harry dump his stuff there.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is asked by Ron if she wants to go to Harry's room, and she quickly agrees.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who has not told his friends something important, and he mentions that his scar was hurting again on Saturday morning.

relationships.description: Ron and Harry are friends as they go to Harry's room together.
Hermione is also a friend of Harry, as she agrees to go with him to his room.
Ron and Hermione are friends as they both agree to go with Harry to his room.
